pluginstrument.author: flyatr
pluginstrument.description:
Altimeter for the ATR 72-500
V 1.22 and 1.23 - AM 3.x support
V 1.21 - replaced jpg by png
V 1.2 - The bezel can now be hidden by clicking in the top left corner of the instrument - New graphics to match all of my ATR gauges
V 1.1 - Altitude alert now operative. Yellow lamp lights up when altitude lies within +/- 1000 and 250 feet of autopilot setting. - Nicer transition of flags (drum roll)
V 1.0 - Altitude display with rotating drums - "OFF" flag visible until master battery is on - Ground proximity flag visible if altitude < 10.000 ft - "Negative" flag if altitude < 0 ft - Barometric pressure shown as mm Hg and mbar
